titleStmt.title: A Christian admonition or friendly exhortation, sent to William Lawd, lace [i.e. late] Arch-bishop of Canterbury, now prisoner in the Tower ... by T.B.
titleStmt.author: Barlow, Thomas, 1607-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Barlow in the Wrenn catalogue.
Reproduction of original in University of Texas Library.
